name: WordUtils_capitalizeTest
description: Unit tests for the WordUtils.capitalize method.

test_cases.name: testCapitalize_nullInput
test_cases.description: Tests the capitalization functionality with a null input.

test_cases.name: testCapitalize_emptyInput
test_cases.description: Tests the capitalization functionality with an empty string input.

test_cases.name: testCapitalize_alreadyCapitalized
test_cases.description: Tests the capitalization functionality with an already capitalized string input.

test_cases.name: testCapitalize_needsCapitalization
test_cases.description: Tests the capitalization functionality with a string that needs capitalization.
